title: Minneapolis Demographic Data 2015, by Neighborhood
description:
Description
Minneapolis Demographic Data 2015, by Neighborhood, from the 2015 American Community Survey
usage: A data frame with 84 observations on the following 7 variables.
reference: The data frame MplsStops contains 2017 Minneapolis Police stop data, using the same neighborhood names as this data file.

parameters.collegeGrad: estimated fraction with a college degree
parameters.black: fraction of the population estimated to be black
parameters.white: fraction of the population estimated to be white
parameters.poverty: estimated fraction earning less than twice the poverty level
parameters.foreignBorn: fraction of the population estimated to be foreign born
